title: Start
body:
Welcome to the game! Your goal is to get into the dungeons and catacombs to find the treasure that's within.
To get started its advisable to read some of the signs in this room before proceeding. Use WASD to move around and [b]Spacebar[/b] while touching objects like doors and signs to interact with them.
end

title: attackDesc
body:
[b]Sword:[/b] Not a spell per say, does low damage but also costs nothing to use. Can be rotated around you with the mouse | No MP use/ Low damage.
[b]Electric Shot:[/b] Fire an electric ball per click | medium MP use/ medium damage.
[b]Wind Shot:[/b] Fire a beam of wind the penetrates through enemies | medium MP use/ low damage (goes through enemies).
[b]Electric Burst:[/b] Fire electric balls in each cardinal and ordinal direction, can't be aimed but does high damage | High MP use/ High damage.
[b]Speed Boost:[/b] Hold the mouse button to increase your speed at the cost of MP | Low MP use.
end

title: enemyDesc
body:
[b]Slimes[/b] will follow you and deal a small bit of damage on touch.
[b]Ghosts[/b] will follow you and stop upon contact, preparing to explode before actually doing so after a second to deal high damage.
[b]Statues[/b] can't move but will regularly fire magical attacks at you in quick succession, they also have the highest health of current enemies.
end

title: controlDesc
body:
Use WASD or the arrow keys to move around and use left click on the mouse to fire spells, some aim at where your mouse is pointing while other have fixed firing or more supportive effects.
The mouse scroll wheel or top row numbers (1-4) can be used to change spells. E is used to drink health potions while R is used to drink Mana potions.
end

title: DevTools
body:
Num8 damages the player for 50 health.
Num9 shows some game stats, currently: FPS, Player position, time played in seconds and player firing angle.
Num0 toggles permanent invulnerability for the player
i key changes the level to level 1
o key changes the level to level 2
p key changes the level to level 3
l key initiates the victory screen
end
